MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD4 area of Earlston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:49pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite in the local area to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:28pm on Tuesday, 16 March 2021
